byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and ALEXANDER BURNS

abstract: As Mr. Kasich and Mr. Christie are locked in a tight battle for fourth place in New Hampshire, America Leads, the “super PAC” supporting Mr. Christie, is running ads accusing Mr. Kasich of profiting off the financial crisis while he was a managing general partner at Lehman Brothers.

headline.main: Group Backing Chris Christie Criticizes John Kasich for Lehman Brother Ties
headline.print_headline: A Pro-Christie Group Targets Kasich With Attack Lines Drawn From Trump

snippet: As Mr. Kasich and Mr. Christie are locked in a tight battle for fourth place in New Hampshire, America Leads, the “super PAC” supporting Mr. Christie, is running ads accusing Mr. Kasich of profiting off the financial crisis while he was a managing general partner at Lehman Brothers.
